scripts.dev: rm -rf _site && ELEVENTY_ENV=development npx @11ty/eleventy --serve & npx postcss src/assets/css/tailwind.css --output _tmp/styles.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_ENV=production npx @11ty/eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx postcss src/assets/css/tailwind.css --output _site/assets/css/styles.css
